senses.sense_definition: An acronym for <w>real</w> <w>estate</w> <w>investment</w> <w>trust</w>, a company that owns, operates, or finances income-generating real estate.

examples.text: Investors often choose a <w>REIT</w> to gain exposure to the property market without buying physical buildings.
The company operates as a <w>REIT</w> and distributes most of its taxable income to shareholders.

senses.sense_definition: Sedge, reed, or seaweed found in water.

examples.text: The fisherman cleared the tangled <w>reit</w> from his nets before casting them again.
Drifts of dark <w>reit</w> washed up on the shore after the heavy storm.
